key_features: Easy-grip neoprene coating for a secure hold
Printed weight number on each end cap
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
Ideal for fitness classes or at-home workout routine
ai_description: This KAKSS dumbbell set features three pairs of chrome-plated steel dumbbells (2.5kg, 3kg, 4kg) with black textured rubber grips for secure handling. The weights are neatly organized on a sleek black A-frame rack with three tiers. The dumbbells display clear weight markings on their silver ends and feature a compact, rounded hexagonal design that prevents rolling. The set presents a professional gym-quality appearance with its metallic shine contrasting against the dark rack and grips.
target_audience: Home gym users and fitness enthusiasts
product_name: KAKSS Supreme Quality Steel Dumbbell With Stand
